name: OCKResponsiveLayout.Rule
desc: A layout rule for a specific content size category.

items.name: init(layout: Layout, greaterThanOrEqualToContentSizeCategory: UIContentSizeCategory)
items.desc: Creates a rule with a layout defined, and a UIContentSizeCategory for the layout to use.

items.name: let contentSizeCategory: UIContentSizeCategory
items.desc: The content size category that the layout uses.

items.name: let layout: Layout
items.desc: The layout to display at or above the given content size category.
